articles.description: The 22-year-old became the youngest and fastest player to reach 20 goals in the Champions League. The Norwegian has boasted a remarkable goal record throughout his career.
articles.content:
Danny Mills has tipped Erling Haaland to score over 40 goals for Manchester City this season if he stays fit.
There are high expectations for the striker after he sealed a £51million move from Borus… [+2264 chars]

articles.author: Dale O'Donnell
articles.title: Manchester United arrange behind-closed-doors friendly vs fifth-tier side - Stretty News
articles.description: Manchester United have arranged an additional pre-season friendly match this week, despite already having two games in two different countries over the course of as many days.
articles.content: According to the Manchester Evening News, United will take on National League side Wrexham in a midweek friendly match. That game has been arranged before the team plays Atletico Madrid in Oslo and R… [+1119 chars]
